attributes.action: Change the name of the Bank of England to the Bank of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the B of E is the bank of the UK government it should be called the Bank of the UK, this would emphasise their responsibility to the whole of the UK, and would underline the long term basis of the union....other benefit how much a windfall would be generated by selling the B of E name to one of the private banks
